item.title: Dog foul needs clearing, 8th August
item.description:
This is just one but there are multiple dog fouls along Dog Kennel Hill at the moment. This one is not long after you turn left out of Pytchley Road - pls clear.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Kennel Hill, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: NOT FIXED!!! Traffic lights sequence timing has a fault as traffic turning right from A20 into Green Lane display conflict with green sequence from Southwood Rd and Green Lane which is a danger to pedestrians and traffic. You need to address this please and not continually ignore. Thank you, 8th August
item.description:
NOT FIXED!!! Traffic lights sequence timing has a fault as traffic turning right from A20 into Green Lane display conflict with green sequence from Southwood Rd and Green Lane which is a danger to pedestrians and traffic. You need to address this please and not continually ignore. Thank you

item.title: Flyposting - Politically offensive poster, 8th August
item.description:
There have been a number of political and offensive posters (revolutionary communist party) fly posted to the bus shelters on Green lanes from Manor house towards Turnpike Lane. Please can they be removed before further posters appear - thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lanes, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (offensive)
